body.name: GoWISE USA 1700-Watt 5.8-QT 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer with Recipe Book, Black
features: Enjoy your favorite food without the extra calories. This air fryer allows you to fry, bake, grill, and roast with little to no oil. Make crispy fried chicken, steak, French fries, pizza and much more in one countertop appliance

Sleek and modern look with advanced touch screen menu. Take the guesswork out of cooking with the built-in touch screen menu featuring 8 cooking presets: Fries/Chips, Pork, Chicken, Steak, Shrimp, Cake, Fish, and Pizza. Equipped with a wide temperature range from 180Fahrenheit to 400Fahrenheit in 10 degree increments and a cooking timer up to 30 minutes

Featuring a new Start/Stop button to change time and temperature in the middle of a cook cycle. Don’t forget to shake with the new built-in alarm function that reminds you to shake your ingredients in 5, 10, 15 minute increments

Comes with non-stick pan and detachable basket equipped with a cool touch handle and button guard to prevent accidental detachment. Shake and flip contents in the middle of your cooking program with the detachable frying basket
Includes recipe book, This recipe book is filled with 50 recipes specifically made for GoWISE USA Air Fryers. Choose from a variety of meals to make for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert
All GoWISE USA products come with a 30-day money back Guarantee, 1-year warranty and forever support from gowise customer care. Registered products receive an additional 60 days of Warranty coverage

Searching for a Gift-This air fryer is the perfect gift under the tree for everyone. Get this multifunctional air fryer for the Moms on the go, dads who love to cook, grandparents or anyone who wants to be healthier. This air fryer allows you to cook your favorite fried foods with little to no oil and without the mess that comes with deep frying
Rapid Air Technology - food cooks from all sides at once just like frying in oil, so you'll get that crispy texture you crave
body.description: The GoWISE USA air fryer allows you to enjoy your favorite fried snacks and food without the added calories. Rapid air circulation technology cooks food by circulating hot air in all directions, ensuring fast and even cooking. This XL air fryer has 8 built-in smart programs including fries, pork, shrimp, cake, chicken, steak, fish, and pizza. It offers a wide temperature range from 180◦f-400◦f and a cooking timer for up to 30 minutes. Featuring a new built-in alarm function that reminds the user to shake or check their food in 5, 10, and 15 minute increments. Air frying offers a healthier and easier way to cook, and in 30 minutes or less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and price for Short term rentals
reviews.reviewText: The GoWISE USA 1700-Watt 5.8-QT 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer has proven to be a fantastic addition to our short-term rental amenities. Its versatility and convenience make it an ideal appliance for guests who want to prepare quick and healthy meals during their stay. The 8-in-1 functionality provides a range of cooking options, and the digital controls make it user-friendly. The inclusion of a recipe book adds an extra touch, encouraging guests to explore different dishes. The sleek black design fits well into various kitchen aesthetics. Overall, the GoWISE Air Fryer has been a hit in our short-term rentals, offering a modern and efficient cooking solution that guests appreciate. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewerName: Leonardo di ser Piero da VinciLeonardo di ser Piero da Vinci
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I got this over 15 months ago. I think this is a great fryer. I have cooked a cake, meatballs, lasagna, bread, onion rings, fries, wings, nuggets, egg rolls, fish, shrimp, scallops, crab cakes, chicken, and 100 other things in it, but, admittedly, I use it three times as much to warm leftovers. I mean anything you have leftover that was fried comes out as good as when you ordered it the restaurant. Seriously - as long as you don't over cook it, it is perfect.At first, I was haunted by the reviews that showed the coating coming off the basket after the first time, or some of the other negative reviews. So glad I did let those few overcome me! 15 months later - my basket looks like new. I don't even wash it but maybe once a week (and by wash I mean squirt dawn into a damp soft sponge and wipe it down - that's all it takes, because nothing sticks. Rinse and dry.) I can only imagine what those people did to scrape the coating off - and I bet they will never admit it either.Plug it in, push the second button from the left (15 mins @ 370 default). Up down temp on the left - Up down time on the right. Push the second button from the left and cook. It is amazingly simple and so fast. Don't like the default - it has like 8 preset choices.What do you expect from a fryer? Simple, Easy, Non-stick, and produces great leftovers plus fresh fried and baked food. All checked! This thing is amazing.The only minor negative I have is the temp only changes in 10 degree increments - like there is no 325 degrees possible. So minor - use 320 and be done with it. Easy-Peasy. Comes out perfect anyway.21 month update: finally a couple of issues.1) On the bottom pan is a rubber support to keep the proper distance between the bottom and top pans. This support has rubbed a small section of the coating off.2) The plastic ‘nut cover’ fell of and I tossed it out.Neither has any impact to the operation whatsoever.Included pics of the 2 issues plus a pic of the top of both pans. This is after near daily use over 21 months. Still an amazing buy and value to me.30 month update: Multiple daily uses with great results. Fried some chicken wings for lunch today (not leftovers either). Delish!! Absolutely no change from the 21 month update. Wash once a week - I squirt Dawn on the soft side of a sponge (not the scrubby side) - dry with a paper towel. Never dreamed this would last 2 1/2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace an older GoWise air fryer that I wore out over 5 years of almost daily use. The new model has a different shape, more oblong than round, that I like better. It fits closer to the side wall in the corner of my counter under a cabinet and I like the more rectangular shape of the basket. The controls are easier to use and you can stop it while cooking and change time and/or temperature settings, which you could not do on the older model. It has 8 preset cooking times and temperatures, but I know how I want to cook most things anyway. It is well worth the money, especially if I get another 5 years out of this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but I have concerns
reviews.reviewText: This was actually a replacement purchase. A while back (during the days of Amazon Treasure Truck) I got one of these at a fairly steep discount. I have to say that I loved it, it worked like a better microwave. I could heat up or reheat food to better flavor and consistency, temperature controls were great and I discovered a lot of versatile ways to use it including being able to fry eggs, make grilled cheese, even make breaded porkchops.So you may wonder why my review isn't better. Well the answer is that the first one basically fell apart. Now it went through a move and I can accept that maybe it got damaged during the move or something similar. But we had a couple screws fall out during what I could classify as normal use. In addition after one fall to the floor the baskets container would not fully reconnect with the device. It also started randomly shutting off during use.Now all of this could be chalked up to wear and tear and operator error, and if I'm honest the other options at the price point either didn't have enough volume or didn't offer enough temperature control for the versatility I wanted. But I also noted that some of the problems I mentioned were being echoed in the comments. I was concerned but given the alternatives I decided it would be best to stick with what I knew. Now, overall it does work well and I haven't had it try to shut itself off, however I have had a few instances where the basket and basket container will not seem to want to fit back in. In this case I know I haven't dropped anything and neither have my roommates. While it still functions it does have me concerned that the product may have a more limited lifespan or some kind of common internal issue.I was considering 3 stars but for now the issues have been fairly minor and the other advantages still win out. I will also add that anyone looking to buy it look at getting the liner paper as it is a lifesaver as well as strongly recommend looking at some of the accessories to allow for cooking eggs. All other things considered in a studio apartment I would probably be fairly well set up with this and a decently good slow cooker

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My original air fryer was a cheap Walmart brand. This one is sooo much better. It has multi options on the preset that I use daily. It fits the liners that I already had which makes cleaning so much easier. No complaints so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHEN IT'S HOT, DO NOT HIT THE BUTTON TO RELEASE THE HANDLE, ASIT COULD DROP ON YOUR FOOT AND BURN IT
reviews.reviewText: ITS A GREAT DEVISE, LARGE ENOUGH TO TAKE ANYTHING WE NEED, WORKS WELL CLEANS UP EASY

Cleans up exceptionally well. Learning curve, do not put parchment paper if items are light weight such as sweet potato chips. They are too light to keep paper down, it flew up and burned!!! Easy to set time and temperature. Only issue is with the tray. Takes a while to get it to slide in perfectly. I usually use 2 hands and push it in on each side of the tray. Sits on my counter and looks awesome. We are only 2 people but would not have gone smaller sized as it nice to have room around the items. Definitely would recommend it. And buy from Amazon as it was a seamless delivery, as usual!! 😊

En un inicio tenia mis dudas de si el producto cumpliría con las expectativas. Una vez que llego evalué su desempeño y hasta el momento puedo decir que incluso rebaso mis expectativas. Fácil de utilizar, sencillo de limpiar, y relativamente poco ruido en su funcionamiento. El único detalle que considero pudiese mejorarse es el poder variar las lecturas de la temperatura, ya que se expresan en grados Fahrenheit, pero es sencillo realizar la conversión de ser necesario. Incluye un recetario muy bien editado y sumamente practico, además de la posibilidad de descargar su aplicación gratuita en donde también se pueden consultar las recetas. Un producto elegante y funcional que te permitirá cocinar con menor cantidad de grasas. En algunos alimentos el cambio de sabor es muy marcado, pero considero que bien vale la pena el acostumbrarse. Muy recomendable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Thought I was buying an American made product; all the information pointed to this but it was not; so very disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Need a voltage converter in India and it isn’t easy to find
reviews.reviewText: Can’t be used in India unless you buy a voltage converter. Took some extra effort to buy the right type of step down voltage converter.Used a few times and seem to work fine. But a lot more expensive than the ready to use Indian models without having to buy a voltage converter.
La compre hace 2 años en oferta, es de las que mejor tamaño tienen en comparación a la competencia, buena potencia, muchas funciones, de muy buena calidad.
